Description: JotForm helps you create online forms and collect data, all without needing to write a single line of code.
Name: JotForm

Methods.Name: List Form Uploads
Methods.Description: Retrieves a list of all files uploaded on the specified form.

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Get user account details for this JotForm user. Including user account type, avatar URL, name, email, website URL and account limits.

Methods.Name: List User History
Methods.Description: User activity log about things like forms created/modified/deleted, account logins and other operations.

Methods.Name: List Form Questions
Methods.Description: Retrieves all questions for the specified form.

Methods.Name: List Forms
Methods.Description: Retrieves all forms for this account

Methods.Name: List Form Submissions
Methods.Description: Retrieves all responses to the specified form.

Methods.Name: List New User Submissions
Methods.Description: Retrieves submissions for all forms on this account submitted since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List New Form Submissions
Methods.Description: Retrieves responses to the specified form submitted since the last time this action was executed.

Methods.Name: List User Submissions
Methods.Description: Retrieves all submissions for all forms on this account.
